data.title: United States Surveyor General Maps
data.meta_description: California land grant maps created by the United States Surveyor General.
data.text:
United States Surveyor General for California

The maps in the following list are arranged alphabetically by name of grant. Searches by keyword can be performed using using the Find function of your browser.

Please contact the Reference Desk to view a map or purchase copies.
